amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 111-21 to require a servicer that receives an incentive payment under the Hope for Homeowners program to notify all mortgagors under mortgages they service who are "at-risk homeowners", that they may be eligible for the HOPE for Homeowners Program and how to obtain information regarding the program.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Titus amendment was withdrawn.
